settings.html: Explore 1,500+ global universities and colleges. Submit your best possible application with a 95% success rate. Unlock your full potential with Formivia

settings.title: Find Your Study Program in Seconds

settings.editor:
Choosing the right program abroad can feel overwhelming. That’s where Formivia steps in — your intelligent companion for finding, filtering, and applying to international programs in just a few clicks.

With Formivia, you get:

icon_list.text: Find study programs by country, field, and goals.
Get matched and redirected to top partner platforms like ApplyBoard.
Access premium eBooks with everything you need to succeed (visa, funding, housing).
No need to browse 10 sites — we bring the right ones to you.

settings.premium_title_text: Start Your Study Abroad Journey with Confidence

settings.editor:
Studying abroad is an exciting opportunity, but it starts with a clear and structured plan. In this first step, we help you understand the foundational stages of your study journey — from selecting the right program based on your interests and goals, to choosing a country that aligns with your future.
You’ll learn how to research institutions, compare program requirements, and prepare your academic documents. This step lays the strategic groundwork to make your application smooth and impactful.

You’ll discover:

  • How to define your academic goals

  • How to choose the right study destination

  • What documents and deadlines to prepare early

  • How to avoid common mistakes before applying

settings.premium_title_text: Navigate the Legal Side with Confidence

settings.editor:
Visa and immigration rules can seem complex — but with the right guidance, it becomes manageable. This step gives you clarity and structure on how to apply for a student visa, what documents to submit, and how to prove your financial stability or acceptance.
We also cover post-arrival procedures, temporary permits, and long-term pathways depending on the country you’re going to. Whether you’re applying to Canada, France, Germany, or the UK — we’ll give you localized insights.

You’ll discover:

  • Visa types by country and how to apply

  • Tips to pass your visa interview

  • Required documents and processing times

  • What to do upon arrival (biometrics, residence card…)

One of the biggest concerns for international students is financing their education. In this step, we help you explore scholarship opportunities, grants, financial aid, and part-time work policies based on your destination.
You’ll also get practical tools for budgeting your life abroad, finding affordable programs, and building a sustainable financial plan. Because studying abroad shouldn’t only be for the wealthy — it should be for the prepared.

You’ll discover:

  • Types of scholarships (merit-based, need-based, government, private)

  • Where to search and how to apply

  • Budgeting tools and templates

  • Insights on part-time jobs while studying

settings.premium_title_text: Feel at Home While Studying Abroad

settings.editor:
Finding the right place to live is essential for your comfort, safety, and overall experience. This step helps you understand the different housing options available for students — from university dorms to private rentals and shared apartments.
We’ll also guide you on how to secure housing before arrival, avoid scams, and what to consider in terms of location, cost, and amenities. A great learning experience starts with a great living space.

You’ll discover:

  • Types of student housing (on-campus, private, shared)

  • How to apply for accommodation in your destination country

  • What to look for in a lease agreement

  • Practical tips for living abroad (utilities, roommates, security)

settings.nothing_found_message_text: It seems we can’t find what you’re looking for.

tabs.tab_title: How does Formivia help me find a study program?
tabs.tab_content: Formivia matches you with programs abroad based on your goals, country preference, and field of study — all through a smart, easy-to-use system.

tabs.tab_title: Is Formivia a university or an agency?
tabs.tab_content: No. Formivia is a digital platform that connects students with trusted study-abroad partners. We don’t offer courses ourselves — we guide you to the right ones.

tabs.tab_title: Do I need to pay to use Formivia?
tabs.tab_content: Searching programs is free. Some premium resources (like guides and templates) are paid to help you prepare faster and better.

tabs.tab_title: Will I get help with my application or visa?
tabs.tab_content: Yes. After finding a program, you’ll be redirected to a trusted partner platform that offers application support, visa help, and more.

settings.title: Launch Your Career Journey through Formivia.
